title: Anti-Anti-Racists, Taco Slander?! 9.18.20
itunes:title: Anti-Anti-Racists, Taco Slander?! 9.18.20
description:
In episode 718, Miles and guest host Scam Goddess Laci Mosley are joined by comedian and Culture King Jacquis Neal to discuss Turning Point USA's troll farm, William Barr comparing quarantine to slavery, comically dumb anti-mask protests, how easily the police covered up Daniel Prude's death, Stassi Schroeder's apology, the food worth trying in every state, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Pro-Trump youth group enlists teens in secretive campaign likened to a ‘troll farm,’ prompting rebuke by Facebook and Twitter
  2. Barr accuses Justice Department of headhunting and meddling with politics
  3. Hundreds turned out for anti-mask protest in Utah, which is being mocked as 'a straight parody' on social media
  4. Wow. Anti-mask protester in Utah: "When George Floyd was saying 'I can't breathe,' and then he died, and now we're wearing a mask and w'e're saying 'I can't breathe,' but we're being forced to wear them."
  5. Documents Reveal How the Police Kept Daniel Prude’s Death Quiet
  6. Stassi Schroeder Would Like You to Forgive Her for Being Racist: 'I Wasn't Anti-Racist'
  7. 50 States, 50 Cuisines: The Food Worth Traveling For in Every State
  8. WATCH: Darondo (feat. Dave Allison): Didn't I (Dave Allison Rework)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
